message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still unable to meet you at $16,000. My maximum budget remains at $12,000.
